features: Rich Lather- Experience the smoothest shave you've ever had, leaving your skin silky soft
Great Scent- Contains natural oils to leave you smelling like a man
Irritation Free- Great for sensitive skin and contains natural ingredients that help to condition your skin
Last a Long Time- A little goes a long way with our highly concentrated formula that creates a rich thick lather
The Viking Promise: If for any reason, you’re not completely satisfied, simply contact us and we’ll take care of it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Join the Viking Revolution Our team is wholeheartedly committed to making sure that each product we offer is of the highest quality, using only premium ingredients and materials. Grow and care for your beard or mustache with our grooming products in complete confidence. Our results speak for themselves and us back all our beard care treatments and accessories.

The Viking Experience Beard care is a passionate affair. Whatever the style, color, length or shape of your facial hair, we take looking after it very seriously, because your beard is going to make a statement, so make it a good one! In just 1 year, what started out as a hobby between two bearded friends frustrated by the limited and uninspiring Beard Care industry became the go-to brand for Men’s Grooming. If you’re a modern man with high standards and an awesome beard - go ahead, join the unique experience that is the Viking Revolution and see what we are all about. The Viking Quality You deserve the best, and so does your beard. The entire Viking Revolution team is wholeheartedly committed to making sure that each and every product we offer is of the highest quality, using only premium ingredients and materials. We also supply our products in man-size quantities, so they won’t run out before you’re ready. Our scents are carefully curated to keep them fresh and masculine without being overwhelming, and wherever possible we use natural formulations and avoid including harsh, unnecessary chemicals that aren’t kind to your skin or the planet. The Viking Promise Grow and care for your beard in complete confidence. We are completely sure that you will love every one of our products, but if for any reason you’re not happy with any item from our beard care range, just let us know and we will fix it. We are proud that our results speak for themselves, and that once you have experienced the feel of a Viking Revolution beard, you’ll never go back. If you’re ready to up your grooming game, try the latest men’s beard care products and find out why we have taken the industry by storm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a shave cream that was thick and unscented. This works great! It's creamy and thick, so it stays in place while I shave in the shower. No complaints. Would buy again. Good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works and lasts
reviews.reviewText: This product works well and lasts a long time. Better than Gillette cream. Definitely will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Good layer of cushion/protection between the razor and skin. I have sensitive skin and there’s not many shave soaps or creams I’ve used that haven’t irritated me and made my face (and especially neck) red, but this one I was very pleased with. Lather builds well, a little goes a long way, with decent slickness for a second pass. Didn’t dry my face out and the clary sage scent is moderate and very nice, but doesn’t last long post shave (not a pro or con for me particularly but might be for some). Plus it works with and w/o a shave brush, I personally use a shave bowl as well but it’s not necessary as face lathering works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it. I have a fragrance sensitivity that often irritates my skin.This is first shave cream that I have used that is truly fragrance free and does not irritate my skin.Plus, I love the packaging. Open the lid and get as much or as little as you want.Definitely as advertised and worth. I'm pleased!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gran espuma y buena sensación
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto mucho la espuma de esta crema deja una sensación genial en tu cara.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I always use of art of shaving and love it. This cream is thick but gives me a smoother shave than Art of Shaving. Leaves your face feeling really smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a soap
reviews.reviewText: This wasn't exactly what I was hoping for. I like to lather my brush on a soap cake, this is creamy, and I should have realized by the description, my error.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
